Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_ROOM_TYPE

The basic type MILES_ROOM_TYPE specifies a room type to use for the environmental reverb.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 ENVIRONMENT_GENERIC Default setting. (Debugger value: 0).
 ENVIRONMENT_PADDEDCELL Padded cell reverb. (Debugger value: 1).
 ENVIRONMENT_ROOM Simple room reverb. (Debugger value: 2).
 ENVIRONMENT_BATHROOM Bathroom reverb. (Debugger value: 3).
 ENVIRONMENT_LIVINGROOM Living room reverb. (Debugger value: 4).
 ENVIRONMENT_STONEROOM Stone room reverb. (Debugger value: 5).
 ENVIRONMENT_AUDITORIUM Auditorium reverb. (Debugger value: 6).
 ENVIRONMENT_CONCERTHALL Concert hall reverb. (Debugger value: 7).
 ENVIRONMENT_CAVE Cave reverb. (Debugger value: 8).
 ENVIRONMENT_ARENA Arena reverb. (Debugger value: 9).
 ENVIRONMENT_HANGAR Hanger reverb. (Debugger value: 10).
 ENVIRONMENT_CARPETEDHALLWAY Carpeted hallway reverb. (Debugger value: 11).
 ENVIRONMENT_HALLWAY Hallway reverb. (Debugger value: 12).
 ENVIRONMENT_STONECORRIDOR Stone corridor reverb. (Debugger value: 13).
 ENVIRONMENT_ALLEY Alley reverb. (Debugger value: 14).
 ENVIRONMENT_FOREST Forest reverb. (Debugger value: 15).
 ENVIRONMENT_CITY City reverb. (Debugger value: 16).
 ENVIRONMENT_MOUNTAINS Mountains reverb. (Debugger value: 17).
 ENVIRONMENT_QUARRY Quarry reverb. (Debugger value: 18).
 ENVIRONMENT_PLAIN Open plain reverb. (Debugger value: 19).
 ENVIRONMENT_PARKINGLOT Parking lot reverb. (Debugger value: 20).
 ENVIRONMENT_SEWERPIPE Sewer pipe reverb. (Debugger value: 21).
 ENVIRONMENT_UNDERWATER Underwater reverb. (Debugger value: 22).
 ENVIRONMENT_DRUGGED Drugged reverb. (Debugger value: 23).
 ENVIRONMENT_DIZZY Dizzy reverb. (Debugger value: 24).
 ENVIRONMENT_PSYCHOTIC Psychotic reverb. (Debugger value: 25).


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Sections: Creative's EAX 1 Preferences, Reverb 3 Filter
Related Functions: AIL_3D_room_type, AIL_3D_sample_effects_level, AIL_set_3D_room_type, AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level
